overview:
fAArOO EasyWeb, a free platform to create web pages accessible to everyone

How to own a website ? For someone or a company who does not know the ‘web technical language’, this operation must be given to a third computer skills. A friend, a friend of a friend, a ‘hacker’, a free software to install, a web specialist company (…) : many miracles solutions lead, in fact, to build a site with delayed problems, particularly regarding the maintenance and updating of pages.

According to Marius G., co-founder of fAArOO, Â«we all know around us people who want to submit and update their business on the Internet… without ruin and ‘yawning’ next director almighty !! Overall, we had the idea of creating an online service that finally allows everyone to create and edit simple and free web pagesÂ».

Our online platform EasyWeb is a free Internet service that makes it accessible to all the creation and updating of websites. It couples both the solutions of building and hosting pages of the sites. Mr. Judicael, partner, likes to recall Â«by now when the web is verticalizing by complex services-oriented community sites, simple and effective web storefronts will multiplyÂ».

A simple, fun and powerful workshop

Thanks to the efforts made to ergonomics and usability of the EasyWeb platform, the site author can, just with a simple browser and an Internet connection, compose or update its pages freely from his account. Currently, a library of 18 ‘fAArOOdgets’ (media objects, pictures, comments, navigation bars, maps …) is proposed to help achieve them. Mathieu T, partner in charge of solutions, built Â«a stackable architecture capable of taking over the new web advances, without limitation, into new fAArOOdgetsÂ».

Freedom to deal with technical and location independence !

The EasyWeb platform differs mainly by its approach WYSIWYG (What You See Is What You Get) when composing the pages and the free handling of each item (content, style, position, size), allowing to create a page so playful and intuitive (drag / move / resize). In addition, the use of thematic lists allows the site author to modify the content of the pages without touching the layout, a real added value to the pages updated frequently !

I really own my website and I manage it without technical skill.

No commitment, your workshop is available freely upon registration

A space of 100 MB is available from registration, to begin to create pages within the limit of maximum two publications. A monthly subscription is proposed to remove this limit and then to allow the full construction of the site.
